governance-title: DIP 2:  Vote for the transaction fee collection ratio to buy DERI from the secondary market to be burned
governance-options-one: Share transaction fee with the DERI holders:
governance-options-one-describe: 50% of the transaction fee will be put into a DAO fund, which is to regularly buy DERI from the secondary market to be burned (i.e. recycled to be mined again).
governance-options-two: Buy back DERI with transaction fee income:
governance-options-two-describe: 80% of the transaction fee will be put into a DAO fund, which is to regularly buy DERI from the secondary market to be burned (i.e. recycled to be mined again).
governance-options-three: Keep the status quo. 20% of the transaction fee will be put into a DAO fund, which is to regularly buy DERI from the secondary market to be burned (i.e. recycled to be mined again).
vote-rules-one: 1. Your voting power is your DERI balance + the corresponding DERI amount of your DERI-USDT SLP balance on Sushiswap and Pancake + the corresponding DERI amount of your DLT balance in the DERI-based Inno Zone pools as of the deadline.
vote-rules-one-describe-two: Voting Power = balanceOf(DERI) + balanceOf(DERI-USDT SLP) * totalDERIonSushi / totalSupply(DERI-USDT SLP) + balanceOf(DERI-BUSD CLP)*totalDERIonPancake / totalSupply(DERI-BUSD CLP) + balanceOf(DLT Percentage)*totalPoolTotalLiquidity
vote-rules-two: You can choose any of the 4 chains (ETH/BSC/Polygon/HECO) to sign your vote by the deadline
vote-rules-four: A snapshot will be taken at the block at the deadline and used to calculate the result. That is, if you vote before the deadline but have transferred your DERI, SLP, CLP, or DLT before the deadline, it is the balance at the deadline that counts.
